engine.util.menu

Interface IMenuHandler


  • public interface IMenuHandler
    Interface for handling a selected menu option.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleMenu(int option, MenuStack stack)
      Called when a particular menu option is selected.

    • Method Detail

      • handleMenu

        void handleMenu(int option,
              MenuStack stack)
        Called when a particular menu option is selected.
        Parameters:
        option - The option that was selected.
        stack - The MenuStack that the menu is a part of.
